name: Kai
description:
Kai is a 2D physics-based puzzle platformer that follows Kai, the tree spirit! Use their roots to swing around levels to bring back seeds to their hub and repopulate the forest. 

Kai was created for Global Game Jam 2023 at the Portland Indie Game Squad site!

CREDITS:
Corrin Coffey - Sound Design/Music
Forest LaPointe - Programming
Griffin Thenell - Art/Game Design

Global Game Jam Page
